title: Jump in for the mini-event Nov 1 @ 11AM ET to watch Fortnite crash into Springfield!

author: Fortnite
description: Sidekicks are a new cosmetic in Fortnite that tag along in Battle Royale, LEGO® Fortnite, creator-made experiences, and more. Enjoy their company as they react to the world around you! You can customize the Appearance of most Sidekicks one time in your Locker after obtaining ‘em. Your choices are permanent, so make sure to preview the Appearance before locking it in.
title: Fortnite Sidekicks | Tutorial Video
